masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote:
"Someone left a superhero costume in one of my dryersâ€”and I don't mean a Halloween knockoff. This thing is REAL. High-tech fabric, built-in electronics, the works. There's a logo I recognize from the news. I don't want to post it online but... should I? Is there a reward? Can someone come get this before it attracts attention?"
